helm-values.affinity.description:
Kubernetes affinity: constraints for pod assignment
For example:
nodeAffinity:
  requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
    nodeSelectorTerms:
    - matchExpressions:
      - key: foo.bar.com/role
        operator: In
        values:
        - master

helm-values.app.approval.enabled.description: enabled determines whether the ClusterRole and ClusterRoleBinding for approval is created. You will want to disable this if you are managing approval RBAC elsewhere from this chart, for example if you create them separately for all installed issuers.

helm-values.app.metrics.port.description: Port for exposing Prometheus metrics on 0.0.0.0 on path '/metrics'.

helm-values.commonLabels.description: Labels to apply to all resources

helm-values.crds.enabled.description: This option decides if the CRDs should be installed as part of the Helm installation.

helm-values.crds.keep.description:
This option makes it so that the "helm.sh/resource-policy": keep annotation is added to the CRD. This will prevent Helm from uninstalling the CRD when the Helm release is uninstalled. WARNING: when the CRDs are removed, all cert-manager custom resources
(Certificates, Issuers, ...) will be removed too by the garbage collector.

helm-values.deploymentAnnotations.description: Optional additional annotations to add to the google-cas-issuer Deployment

helm-values.image.digest.description:
Target image digest. Will override any tag if set. for example:
digest: sha256:0e072dddd1f7f8fc8909a2ca6f65e76c5f0d2fcfb8be47935ae3457e8bbceb20

helm-values.image.registry.description: Target image registry. Will be prepended to the target image repositry if set.

helm-values.image.tag.description: Target image version tag. Defaults to the chart's appVersion.

helm-values.imagePullSecrets.description: Optional secrets used for pulling the google-cas-issuer container image.

helm-values.nodeSelector.description:
Kubernetes node selector: node labels for pod assignment
For example:
kubernetes.io/os: linux

helm-values.podAnnotations.description: Optional additional annotations to add to the google-cas-issuer Pods

helm-values.podLabels.description: Optional additional labels to add to the google-cas-issuer Pods

helm-values.priorityClassName.description: Optional priority class to be used for the google-cas-issuer pods.

helm-values.replicaCount.description: Number of replicas of google-cas-issuer to run.

helm-values.resources.description:
Kubernetes pod resource requests/limits for google-cas-issuer.
For example:
limits:
  cpu: 100m
  memory: 128Mi
requests:
  cpu: 100m
  memory: 128Mi

helm-values.serviceAccount.annotations.description: Optional annotations to add to the service account

helm-values.tolerations.description:
Kubernetes pod tolerations for google-cas-issuer
For example:
 - operator: "Exists"
